title: I just got perma banned for using a third party software even though I did nothing.
body: I woke up today and saw two emails saying my account is banned for  using a third party software. I have never used a exploit but yet I got banned with no proof of me doing so.

replies.body:
They can't prove it, if they did then you'd know how they caught you (provided that you're actually a scripter).

If you're innocent then the best thing you can do is just submit a support ticket and be polite and persistent in asking for a manual review of your account. Don't bother asking for proof or explanation, they can't and won't tell you how you were caught, as doing so would undermine the detection system.

False positives are rare, and people who get legitimately banned for scripting wind up acting innocent just like everyone else. There's no way for us to know whether you're one of the innocent ones or one of the guilty ones. Posting about it won't accomplish anything, just submit a support ticket and be polite and persistent.

Good luck mate, if you're innocent then I hope you get unbanned, and if you're guilty then know that _everyone_ looks down on you for cheating and being dishonest.
They can prove it though. The reason they dont tell you how they know is because it would tell the people who make these programs exactly what to tweak to fly under the radar

Right, they can _technically_ prove it, but Riot's policies likely forbid the support person from doing so, hence why I say that they "can't" do it.

I did sort of cover that in saying that "if they did it would reveal how the system works."

But yeah I'm with you 100%.
I swear on my life that i am innocent, so I guess I have to send them a lot tickets until they do a full review and see that I am inncoent

Your best bet is to send a ticket, being polite and persistent whenever they reply, but not to bump your ticket if they haven't replied, as bumping a ticket puts it at the back of the line for reviews again.

Good luck.
I was so panicked but glad to see it was not just me

dont wanna ruin your hopes, but riot bans that stuff always in waves.
and so far i only heard of 1 guy being falsely banned.

If you are thinking of the same 1 guy as I am it was 1 wave of bans that had a bunch of false-positives that was flagging on some innocent piece of software so it isn't out of the question that they made a mistake again... just not very likely.
Is there a chance I can get my account back?
I wonder how many support tickets have been sent in for this, cus what only 1-5% of players with bother posting on the forums. i bet they have hundreds
same thing happened to me today
this is 7 posts today for the same thing, your not alone bud
